sentences.en: "Tell them to hold all my calls, Theresa," she instructed her dresser.
sentences.cn: “特雷莎，告诉他们我所有的电话都别挂。”她吩咐她的服装师。

sentences.en: A sharp dresser, Wyatt is never seen in casual clothes.
sentences.cn: 怀亚特衣着入时，从未有人见过他穿便装。
克利夫是讲究衣着整洁美观的人。

sentences.en: Elaine braced herself against the dresser and looked in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 伊莱恩紧贴着衣橱照镜子。

sentences.en: He went to the beautiful old Welsh dresser that graced this homely room.
sentences.cn: 他走到为这间舒适的房间增色不少的漂亮的旧威尔士碗橱前。
他是个穿着很有格调的人.

sentences.en: Ivy leaves embellish the front of the dresser.
sentences.cn: 梳妆台正面饰有常春藤叶子。

sentences.en: Marianne got a couple of mugs from the dresser and popped a teabag into each of them.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安娜从碗橱拿了几个杯子，在每个杯中迅速地放入茶包。

sentences.en: Rickman worked as a dresser to Nigel Hawthorne.
sentences.cn: 里克曼曾是奈杰尔·霍索恩的服装师。

sentences.en: She had always been a smart dresser and had on one of her linen frocks.
sentences.cn: 她一向衣着讲究，这回穿的是她众多亚麻连衣裙中的一条。

sentences.en: She pulled herself unsteadily from the bed to the dresser.
sentences.cn: 她颤巍巍地由床边挪到梳妆台前。
斯特拉是个穿着很时髦的人.

sentences.en: The green wall-paper is the perfect complement to the old pine of the dresser.
sentences.cn: 绿色的墙纸完美地衬托出衣橱那年代久远的松木。

sentences.en: The professor's a radical in politics but a conservative dresser.
sentences.cn: 教授在政治上是激进派,但衣着却很守旧.

words.tran_cn: 梳妆台；碗柜；化妆师；裹伤员

phrases.tran_cn: 砂轮修整装置；砂轮整形器；磨轮修整器

trans.tran_cn: 化妆台，（剧组的）服装员，食具柜，外科手术助手
trans.tran_en: a large piece of furniture with open shelves for storing plates, dishes etc
